resources:
Eppy
Welcome to Eppy! Settings Page Alarm Page
//Alarm page My Alarms Add New Alarm
Hello blank fragment Create Your New Alarm Alarm Name Set time Morning trivia to jump start your brain! Number of Questions(3-10) Select Difficulty Save Eppy alarm\n Next question sample text Description: The idea is that Eppy will help you to wake up in the morning by preventing you from hitting the snooze button and instead forcing you to do a set of trivia questions to jump start your brain. How to use: Head over to the alarm page and press “Add New Alarm” button. This will take you to a form to set a name and time for the alarm. And select a number of questions and difficulty for the morning trivia. Note: The functionality for making the alarms go off is broken. So for now to test out the trivia press the “Trivia” button on the alarm page after setting an alarm.
//difficulty
easy
medium
